programs.title: Meals for Seniors Program
programs.description: The pentecostal of Compton presents to you a Drive Thru and Walk Uo Community Food Pantry. Please wear a mask, social distancing and other precautions will be taken into place

programs.title: Buddy to Buddy Program
programs.description: We want to be at service to the wellbeing and future of our world and we need to start in our own communities. A collective of spiritual healers, educators, organizers, creatives, looking to rebuild culture of collaborative caretaking by providing resources and emotional support to historically marginalized people of color.

programs.title: Elders + Single Parents Food Delivery Support
programs.description: This program is to help the most vulnerable individuals, which are the seniors. The program will not onlly delivery a hot mean but also help the restaurants that are suffering during this time. The funding that we have received will be used to purchase hot meals from restaurants in the city of Compton, which will help the businesses stay afloat. Delivery between 11am-2pm Monday - Friday. Register online or by phone. **Limited Spots**
